summary: This is an email chain from July 25, 2019, regarding difficulties obtaining information about an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The sender seeks assistance from the Federal Bureau of Prisons after local officials were unable to get details from the facility's warden and assistant warden.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email, identified as a high-profile prisoner at MCC New York who was involved in an unspecified incident.

persons.name: Associate Warden
persons.role: Associate Warden at MCC New York
persons.context: An associate warden at MCC New York who is copied on the email and is indicated as a point of contact for information regarding the incident involving Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: The warden at MCC New York who, along with the assistant warden, was reportedly unresponsive to inquiries about the incident involving Jeffrey Epstein from the USM and Chief for the S/New York office.

persons.name: Assistant Warden
persons.role: Assistant Warden at MCC New York
persons.context: The assistant warden at MCC New York who, along with the warden, was reportedly unresponsive to inquiries about the incident involving Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: The warden was responsible for the facility where Epstein was incarcerated, and the email indicates the warden was not providing information about an incident involving Epstein.
The assistant warden was a staff member at the facility where Epstein was incarcerated, and the email indicates the assistant warden was not providing information about an incident involving Epstein.
Both are administrative staff at MCC New York, with the associate warden being copied as a potential alternative contact for information after the warden and assistant warden were unresponsive.

events.title: Incident at MCC New York involving Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: An unspecified incident occurred involving high-profile prisoner Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, prompting external officials to seek information about it.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
Washington DC 20534 (Federal Bureau of Prisons office)
keyFacts: On July 25, 2019, there was an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
Officials from the USM and Chief for the S/New York office were unable to obtain basic information about the incident from the MCC New York Warden and Assistant Warden.
The Federal Bureau of Prisons was contacted for assistance, and an Associate Warden at MCC was identified as a potential point of contact.
The email is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the SDNY document set, indicating it was part of the Southern District of New York's investigation or records.
